comments: Dr. Su is an outstanding professor. He truly cares about chemistry and his students. He does go fast during lecture and assigns homework from the text but never collects it. He takes the homework from class and puts it into the exams, so doing the homework helps you pass his exams. If you don\'t study then you will fail. Great teacher but difficult

comments: Bases his class on "speed" over comprehension. Gives 50 mins to take 7 page tests of around 15 questions. 4-5 are always worth at least 15 points (multiple parts) and if you mess up in the beginning no partial credit. Class averages for every exam are around 50-60% but will never curve.

comments: DR. Su is an outstanding professor and you will learn Chemistry. However don\'t expect it to be easy my memories of this class were late nights at the library and a lot of work. His lectures are helpful and his understanding of Chem is quite strong. Dr. Su is a good prof, people fail his class because they don\'t put in the required amount of effort

comments: Dr. Su is one of my favorite science professors. I think he\'s really misunderstood. Don\'t get me wrong, I look for easy classes and professors as much as the next guy, but this class was worth it. I learned a lot from Dr. Su, and he\'s freaking awesome. He\'s smart and funny, and the class is straightforward. If you do the work, it\'ll show. Study!

Class beat me down.

comments: Dr. Su is a really funny guy, but his good aspects end their. His english is horrible, his notes are useless, and his tests are impossible. He has a 50 minute lecture, and he trys to cover subjects that would normally take about 100 minutes to cover. He\'s not a bad guy, just not a good teacher.

comments: I hated this class. The HW was very time consuming. The tests are long and very difficult and my class only had 50min. to complete them. I am not a stupid person but his condescending attitude made me feel as though I am. I had to pay an amazing tutor $20 an hour just to get a C in this class. Hes not a mean person, just a bad teacher.
